## Installation

To install the developmental version of ``NLMR``, use the following R code:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("marcosci/NLMR")
```

## Citation

To cite package '_NLMR_' in publications please use:

```{r, echo  = FALSE, result = "asis", comment = ""}
cat(paste0("Sciaini M and Simpkins, CE (2017). NLMR: Simulating neutral landscape models with R. R package version ",packageDescription("NLMR")$Version,". https://github.com/marcosci/NLMR.\n"))
```

Additionally, we keep a [record of publications](https://marcosci.github.io/NLMR/iarticles/publication_record.html) that use _NLMR_.
Hence, if you used _NLMR_ please [file an issue on GitHub](https://marcosci.github.io/NLMR/issues/new) so we can add it to the list.
